timeline.message:
Jersey connector to Helidon WebClient

Signed-off-by: Jan Supol <jan.supol@oracle.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Make sure all versions are declared in one of the appropriate parent poms.
Also, why the pom type dependency ?
You may want to consider not making this PR as draft, otherwise you won't have feedback from the pipelines.
timeline.author: romain-grecourt
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,73 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+    <parent>
+        <artifactId>helidon-jersey-project</artifactId>
+        <groupId>io.helidon.jersey</groupId>
+        <version>2.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
+    </parent>
+    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+    <artifactId>helidon-jersey-connector</artifactId>
+    <name>Helidon WebClient Jersey Connector</name>
+
+    <dependencies>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>io.helidon.jersey</groupId>
+            <artifactId>helidon-jersey-client</artifactId>
+            <!-- for use with plain Jersey -->
+            <scope>provided</scope>
+        </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>io.helidon.webclient</groupId>
+            <artifactId>helidon-webclient</artifactId>
+        </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
+            <artifactId>junit-jupiter-api</artifactId>
+            <scope>test</scope>
+        </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
+            <artifactId>junit-jupiter-params</artifactId>
+            <scope>test</scope>
+        </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>com.github.tomakehurst</groupId>
+            <artifactId>wiremock</artifactId>
+            <version>2.21.0</version>
+            <type>pom</type>

timeline.message:
Update wiremock dependencies
